text: Net na vas grekha, yesli vy nameknete vdovam [o zhelanii] posvatat'sya k nim ili zhe umolchite ob etom. Allakh znayet, chto vy budete dumat' o nikh. Ne obeshchayte im vtayne ot drugikh nichego, a tol'ko vedite lyubeznyye rechi [namekami i za zavesoy]. Ne namerevaytes' zaklyuchit' brachnyy soyuz, poka ne istechet ustanovlennyy srok (t. ye. Chetyre mesyatsa i desyat' dney). Znayte, Allakhu vedomo to, chto v vashikh dushakh, tak beregites' Yego! [No takzhe] znayte, chto Allakh - proshchayushchiy i sniskhoditel'nyy
